snippet: In phone interviews with four Sunday programs, Donald J. Trump suggested that he had been singled out for attacks by the hosts of Thursday’s Republican presidential debate.
abstract: Donald J Trump defends himself from criticisms of his performance during first Republican presidential primary debate in interviews with Sunday news programs, particularly his comments about Fox News debate moderator Megyn Kelly and his record on women's issues; Trump reasserts that he would consider third-party candidacy should Republican leadership not treat him fairly.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and MAGGIE HABERMAN

lead_paragraph: In phone interviews with four Sunday programs, Donald J. Trump suggested that he had been singled out for attacks by the hosts of Thursday’s Republican presidential debate.

headline.main: Donald Trump Remains Defiant on News Programs Amid G.O.P. Backlash
headline.print_headline: Trump Remains Defiant on News Programs Amid G.O.P. Backlash
